description.en: This mod enforces you to attach/detach tools and trailers manually. A manual is available here. Changelog v1.3: - Checks on input jointDesc for lowering expections - Script optimizations - Handle turned on exceptions - Take detachLockNodes into account for detaching - Refactored dynamic hoses (allows objectChange) Full detailed changelog: Changelog Manual Attaching
description.de: Dieser Mod zwingt dich Geräte und Anhänger manuell anzukoppeln. Eine Anleitung in Englisch gibt es hier. Changelog v1.3: - Checks on input jointDesc for lowering expections - Script optimizations - Handle turned on exceptions - Take detachLockNodes into account for detaching - Refactored dynamic hoses (allows objectChange) Full detailed changelog: Changelog Manuelles Ankuppeln.
description.pl: Ten mod zmusza cię do ręcznego zaczepiania/odczepiania przyczep, maszyn i narzędzi. Mamy nadzieję, że będziesz się dobrze z nim bawił!
description.ru: Этот мод вынуждает присоединять/отсоединять оборудование и прицепы только вручную. Мы надеемся вам понравится этот мод.
description.it: Questa mod ti impone di attaccare / staccare manualmente strumenti e rimorchi. Un manuale è disponibile qui . Changelog v1.3: - Controlli su input jointDesc per abbassare le aspettative - Ottimizzazioni degli script - Gestire le eccezioni attivate - Prendere in considerazione detachLockNodes per il distacco - riscritta Tubi dinamici (consente objectChange) Registro delle modifiche dettagliato completo: Allegare il registro delle modifiche
